languages.text: The Navigator deals <u>(from {uip|MinDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076} to {uip|MaxDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy. That enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
languages.original_text: Навигатор наносит противнику <u>(от {uip|MinDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076} до {uip|MaxDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}. Этот противник должен пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала он становится {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижен{/g} до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора.

traits.locale_text: The Navigator deals <u>(from 1 to 6)+2×(Willpower bonus)</u> damage to an enemy. That enemy must pass a Willpower resistence check or become immobilised until the start of the Navigator's next turn. Immobilised targets do not regain movement points at the beginning of their turn and cannot use abilities that move them or add movement points.

The Navigator deals <u>((from 1 to 6) + 2 × Willpower bonus)</u> damage to an enemy. That enemy must pass a Willpower resistance test or become immobilised until the start of the Navigator's next turn. Immobilised targets do not regain movement points at the beginning of their turn and cannot use abilities that move them or add movement points.

The Navigator deals <u>(from {uip|MinDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076} to {uip|MaxDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy. That enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

The Navigator deals <u>(from {uip|MinDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076} to {uip|MaxDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy. That enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: Навигатор наносит противнику <u>(от {uip|MinDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076} до {uip|MaxDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}. Этот противник должен пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала он становится {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижен{/g} до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора.
languages.original_text: The Navigator deals <u>((from 1 to 6) + 2 × Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> damage to an enemy. That enemy must pass a Willpower resistance test or become immobilised until the start of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Immobilised targets do not regain movement points at the beginning of their turn and cannot use abilities that move them or add movement points.

traits.locale_text: Навигатор наносит противнику <u>((от 1 до 6) + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВОЛ)</u> урона. Этот противник должен пройти проверку Воли на сопротивление. В случае провала он становится обездвижен до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора. Обездвиженные цели не восстанавливают очки передвижения в начале своего хода и не могут использовать способности, которые помогают перемещаться или дают очки передвижения.

Навигатор наносит противнику <u>((от 1 до 6) + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВОЛ)</u> урона. Этот противник должен пройти проверку Воли на сопротивление. В случае провала он становится обездвижен до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора. Обездвиженные цели не восстанавливают очки передвижения в начале своего хода и не могут использовать способности, которые помогают перемещаться или дают очки передвижения.

Навигатор наносит противнику <u>(от {uip|MinDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076} до {uip|MaxDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}. Этот противник должен пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала он становится {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижен{/g} до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора.

languages.text: 导航者对一名敌人造成<u>{uip|MinDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076}-{uip|MaxDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076}</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。目标敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若检定失败会被{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}，直到导航者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始才会解除。
languages.original_text: The Navigator deals <u>(from {uip|MinDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076} to {uip|MaxDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy. That enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 导航者对一名敌人造成<u>（（1到6）+2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>点伤害。目标敌人需要进行意志{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若检定失败则会被定身，直到导航者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始才会解除。被定身的目标在回合开始时无法恢复{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，也无法使用位移或增加移动点数的相关能力。

导航者对一名敌人造成{uip|MinDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076}-{uip|MaxDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076}点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。目标敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若检定失败则会被{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}，直到导航者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始才会解除。

languages.text: El navegante inflige <u>(de {uip|MinDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076} a {uip|MaxDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076})</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a un enemigo. Ese enemigo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} para no quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} hasta el comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del navegante.
languages.original_text: The Navigator deals <u>(from {uip|MinDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076} to {uip|MaxDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy. That enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El navegante inflige {uip|MinDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076}-{uip|MaxDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a un enemigo. Ese enemigo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} para no quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} hasta el comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del navegante. Los objetivos inmovilizados no recuperan {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} al comienzo de sus turnos y tampoco pueden usar {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} que los muevan o les otorguen puntos de movimiento.

El navegante inflige {uip|MinDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076}-{uip|MaxDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a un enemigo. Ese enemigo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} para no quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} hasta el comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del navegante.

languages.text: Der Navigator fügt einem Feind <u>(von {uip|MinDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076} bis {uip|MaxDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu. Dieser Feind muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen oder wird bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Navigators {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Navigator deals <u>(from {uip|MinDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076} to {uip|MaxDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy. That enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Navigator fügt einem Feind {uip|MinDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076}-{uip|MaxDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu. Dieser Feind muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen oder wird bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Navigators {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g}. Gelähmte Ziele erhalten zu Beginn ihres Zugs keine {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} zurück und können keine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} einsetzen, die sie bewegen oder Bewegungspunkte hinzufügen.

Der Navigator fügt einem Feind {uip|MinDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076}-{uip|MaxDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu. Dieser Feind muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen oder wird bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Navigators {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g}.

languages.text: Le Navigateur inflige <u>(entre {uip|MinDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076} et {uip|MaxDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à un ennemi. Cet ennemi doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g} ou être {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisé{/g} jusqu’au début du prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du Navigateur.
languages.original_text: The Navigator deals <u>(from {uip|MinDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076} to {uip|MaxDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy. That enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le Navigateur inflige <u>((de 1 à 6) + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g})</u> points de dégâts à un ennemi. Cet ennemi doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à la Volonté ou il est immobilisé jusqu'au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du Navigateur. Les cibles immobilisées ne regagnent pas de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} au début de leur tour et ne peuvent pas utiliser de capacités leur permettant de se déplacer ou d'acquérir des points de déplacement.

Le Navigateur inflige {uip|MinDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076}-{uip|MaxDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à un ennemi. Cet ennemi doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g} ou il est {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisé{/g} jusqu'au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du Navigateur.

languages.text: 航宙士が敵に<u>{uip|MinDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076}～{uip|MaxDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076}</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。その敵は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければならず、失敗した場合は航宙士の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる。
languages.original_text: The Navigator deals <u>(from {uip|MinDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076} to {uip|MaxDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy. That enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 航宙士は、敵に<u>((1～6) + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>のダメージを与える。その敵は意志力の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければならず、失敗した場合は航宙士の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで移動できなくなる。移動できないターゲットはターン開始時に{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}が回復せず、移動したり移動ポイントを追加するアビリティを使用できない。

航宙士は、敵に{uip|MinDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076}-{uip|MaxDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076}の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。その敵は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければならず、失敗した場合は航宙士の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動できなくなる{/g}。
